name: Djinguereber Mosque
description: One of the oldest mosque in Africa, built in 1327

name: Sankore University
description: One of the three ancient centers of learning in Timbuktu

name: Timbuktu Manuscripts
description: Ancient text showcasing African knowledge in science, astronomyadn medicine

name: Ahmed Baba Institue
description: A research center preserving thousands of manuscripts from the 13th century

name: Flamme de la Paix
description: A monument symbolizing peace, where over 30,000 firearms were burned in 1996

name: Timbuktu Market
description: A bustling market where you can find local crafts, spices, and traditional Tuareg jewelry

name: Lake Faguibine
description: Ones the largest lake in Mali, providing water and life to the region

name: Tuareg Desert Camp
description: Experience Tuareg culture, camel rides, and stunning desert landscapes.
